plot: She thought she was getting the perfect roommate when she ran the ad on Craigslist. She clearly stated "No parties". William decided to have a little "shin-dig" that is about to get him kicked out.
title: My Craigslist Roomie
plot_es: She thought she was getting the perfect roommate when she ran the ad on Craigslist. She clearly stated "No parties". William decided to have a little "shin-dig" that is about to get him kicked out.
plot_en: She thought she was getting the perfect roommate when she ran the ad on Craigslist. She clearly stated "No parties". William decided to have a little "shin-dig" that is about to get him kicked out.
